summary: Comprehensive testing of Promotion System and Withdrawal Limits features completed. All backend APIs working correctly (100% pass rate). Frontend UI fully functional with all features properly displayed.
passed_tests: GET /api/promotions/active - Returns active promotion with all fields
Admin Promotions page - List, Create, Edit, Delete buttons working
Admin Settings page - Min/Max withdrawal inputs visible and editable
User Dashboard - Active promotion card with countdown timer displayed
User Dashboard - ACTIVE badge and glowing border effect
Withdrawal page - Withdrawal Limits notice displayed
Withdrawal page - Min ($25) and Max ($5000) limits shown
Withdrawal page - Withdrawal Schedule notice displayed
Withdrawal page - Button disabled when not withdrawal day
seed_data_creation: Test promotions created during testing were cleaned up
context_for_next_testing_agent: Promotion System and Withdrawal Limits features are fully implemented and working. Active promotion 'New Year 2026 Bonus' exists with 4% self reward and 2% referral reward. Withdrawal limits set to $25 min and $5000 max. Withdrawals are restricted to days 1 and 15 of each month.

promotion_system.admin_crud: Working - Create, Read, Update, Delete all functional
promotion_system.user_dashboard_card: Working - Shows promotion with countdown timer and ACTIVE badge
promotion_system.promotion_rewards_tracking: Working - Admin can view distributed rewards

withdrawal_limits.admin_settings: Working - Min/Max inputs in Admin Settings page
withdrawal_limits.user_display: Working - Limits shown on Withdrawal page
